title: Robotics & RL Researcher
description: Conducted an in-depth literature review on both classical and deep-learning based (RNN, LSTM, Bi-LSTM with attention, etc.) Driver Intention Inference schemes and synthesized findings
Adapted Hybrid Policy Optimization algorithm to use MPC demonstrations to guide reinforcement learning
Wrote custom SAC implementation in PyTorch to get baselines for experimental validation

title: Autonomy Software Lead
description: Used Docker, CARLA and ROS2 to leverage in-house HPC cluster for high-fidelity AV simulation
Led team of 10 in development of ROS2 nodes for various world-modeling solutions for autonomy stack
